Objective: Verify Email ID field accepts valid values
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click on 'My Account' dropdown (Validate ER-01)
2) Click on Login (Validate ER-02)
3) Enter valid value in Email ID Field
4) Enter valid password in Password Field
5) Click Login (Validate ER-03)
Expected Result:
1) The Welcome page should be visible
2) The Login Page should be visible
3) No error should be shown and logged in

Objective: Verify the Email ID field does not accept empty value
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click on 'My Account' dropdown (Validate ER-01)
2) Click on Login (Validate ER-02)
3) Do not enter value in Email ID Field
4) Enter valid password in Password Field
5) Click Login (Validate ER-03)
Expected Result:
1) The Welcome page should be visible
2) The Login Page should be visible
3) An error message "No match for E-Mail Address and/or Password" must be shown

Objective: Verify the email field does not accept invalid email ID's
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click on 'My Account' dropdown (Validate ER-01)
2) Click on Login (Validate ER-02)
3) Enter invalid Email address
4) Enter valid password in Password Field
5) Click Login (Validate ER-03)
Test Data:
Mail ID:
test
test@
test@mail
test@mail.
Expected Result:
1) The Welcome page should be visible
2) The Login Page should be visible
3) An error message "No match for E-Mail Address and/or Password" must be shown

Objective: Verify the Email ID Field accepts and trims leading and trailing spaces
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click on 'My Account' dropdown
2) Click on Login
3) Enter space as first value in Email ID Field
4) Enter valid password in Password Field
5) Click Login
Expected Result: No error should be shown and logged in

Objective: Verify the Email ID Field does not accept accept only spaces as values
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click on 'My Account' dropdown (Validate ER-01)
2) Click on Login (Validate ER-02)
3) Enter multiple spaces as value in Email ID Field
4) Enter valid password in Password Field
5) Click Login (Validate ER-03)
Expected Result:
1) The Welcome page should be visible
2) The Login Page should be visible
3) An error message "No match for E-Mail Address and/or Password" must be shown

3) Enter valid Email in Mail ID Field

Objective: Verify the Password fields does not accept blank values
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click on 'My Account' dropdown (Validate ER-01)
2) Click on Login (Validate ER-02)
3) Enter valid Email in Mail ID Field
4) Enter blank value in Password Field
5) Click Login (Validate ER-03)
Expected Result:
1) The Welcome page should be visible
2) The Login Page should be visible
3) An error message "No match for E-Mail Address and/or Password" must be shown

Objective: Verify the Password fields accepts and trims leading and trailing spaces
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click on 'My Account' dropdown
2) Click on Login
3) Enter valid Email in Mail ID Field
4) Enter valid password with first space in Password Field
5) Click Login
Expected Result: No error should be shown and logged in

Objective: Verify the Password field is toggled to invisibilty
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click on 'My Account' dropdown (Validate ER-01)
2) Click on Login (Validate ER-02)
3) Enter valid Email in Mail ID Field
4) Enter valid password (Validate ER-03)
Expected Result:
1) The Welcome page should be visible
2) The Login Page should be visible
3) The password field should be toggled to invisibilty and only dots are shown

Objective: Verify the Forgotten Password Link works
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click on 'My Account' dropdown and Click Login (ER-01, ER-02)
2) Click Forgotten Password link (Validate ER-03)
Expected Result:
1) The Welcome page should be visible
2) The Login Page should be visible
3) The forgotten password page should be opened

Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click on Login in 'My Account' dropdown (Validate ER-02)
2) Verify the labels (Validate ER-03)
Expected Result:
1) The Welcome page should be visible
2) The Log In page should be visible
3) The labels should be according to requirements

Objective: Verify the all the fields are present
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click on Login in 'My Account' dropdown (Validate ER-02)
2) Verify the fields (Validate ER-03)
Expected Result:

Objective: Verify the all the place holders are present
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click on Login in 'My Account' dropdown (Validate ER-02)
2) Verify the placeholders (Validate ER-03)

Objective: Verify the log in is still there after closing and reopening browser
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Login into the browser (Validate ER-02)
2) Close the browser
3) Open the browser and open site (Validate ER-03)
Expected Result:
1) The Welcome page should be visible
2) The Log In page should be visible
3) The User should be still logged in

Objective: Verify the ability to navigate to login page by different ways
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Clicking Login in My Account Drop Down (Validate ER-01)
2) Clicking Login in right column of options (Validate ER-01)
3) Clicking login page in 'If you already have an account with us, please login at the login page.' section Register page (Validate ER-01)
Expected Result: 1) The Login page should be opened

Objective: Verify the ability to navigate different pages from Login Page without logging in
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click Login in My Account dropdown
2) Click continue in new customer section (Validate ER-01)
3) Click the Register button in right column (Validate ER-02)
4) Click the Forgotten Password button in right column (Validate ER-03)
5) Click the other buttons except Register and Forgotten Password button (Validate ER-04)
Expected Result:
1) User should be navigated to Register page
2) User should be navigated to Register page
3) User should be navigated to Forgotten Password page
4) User should be navigated to Login Page again

Objective: Verify the ability to login using only keyboard
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click Login in My Account dropdown
2) Press Tab keyboard key until the control comes to the E-Mail Address text field and enter the valid email address
3) Press Tab keyboard key to move the control to Password text field and enter the valid password
4) Press Tab keyboard key until the control comes 'Login' button and press 'Enter' key to submit (Validate ER-1)
Expected Result: 1) The User should be Logged in

Objective: Verify the Login Page functionality in all the supported environments
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click Login in My Account dropdown (Validate ER-01)
2) Switch Environments
3) Repeat from Step-1 for other environments
Expected Result: 1) The Login page should work in all supported environments
